content.text:

This article is the discography of French rumba flamenca band Gipsy Kings.

! scope="row" |Live at the Royal Albert Hall

* Label: Telstar

* Concert filmed at the Royal Albert Hall for the world tour of the album Gipsy Kings
|-
! scope="row" |¡Fuego! The Videos''
|
* Released: 1990
* Label: Elektra

|-
! scope="row" |US Tour 90
|
* Released: 1991
* Label: Pioneer Artists
* Formats: VHS, LaserDisc

|-
! scope="row" |Roots: The Recordings
|
* Released: 2004
* Label: Sine
* Formats: DVD
* Bonus DVD with the special edition of the album Roots
|-
! scope="row" |Live at the Kenwood House in London
|
* Released: 2005

|-
! scope="row" |Tierra Gitana & Live in Concert
